sentence: pick up the yellow block closest to the center and place it behind the red block on the left
rotate the foremost yellow block by 45 degrees and align it with the right side of the yellow block you just moved
pick up the middle green one among the other green blocks and place it behind the yellow block you just moved
stack the left red block on top of the second yellow block from the left
place the foremost green block in front of the leftmost yellow block
stack the rightmost yellow block on top of the left green block
